description: This file is a C++ header defining the 'Badger' class within the WPEFramework plugin for app gateway interactions. It includes class declarations, method signatures for handling app-related requests, and references to external interfaces and modules.

classes.name: Badger
classes.description: A plugin class for handling app gateway requests within WPEFramework, providing various methods to interact with device and app information.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns plugin information.

methods.name: HandleAppGatewayRequest
methods.description: Handles an app gateway request based on context, method, and payload, producing a result.

methods.name: DeviceInfo
methods.description: Retrieves device information for a specified appId.

methods.name: DeviceCapabilities
methods.description: Retrieves device capabilities for a specified appId.

methods.name: NetworkConnectivity
methods.description: Retrieves network connectivity status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetDeviceId
methods.description: Retrieves device ID for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetDeviceName
methods.description: Retrieves device name for a specified appId.

methods.name: ValidateCachedPermission
methods.description: Validates cached permissions for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieves timezone information for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetHDCPStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDCP status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetHDRStatus
methods.description: Retrieves HDR status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetDeviceType
methods.description: Retrieves device type for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetAudioModeStatus
methods.description: Retrieves audio mode status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetWebBrowserStatus
methods.description: Retrieves web browser status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetWiFiStatus
methods.description: Retrieves WiFi status for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetNativeDimensions
methods.description: Retrieves native dimensions for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetVideoDimensions
methods.description: Retrieves video dimensions for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetDeviceModel
methods.description: Retrieves device model information for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetLocalizationPostalCode
methods.description: Retrieves postal code for localization for a specified appId.

methods.name: ShowToaster
methods.description: Displays a toaster message for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetPayload
methods.description: Retrieves payload data for a specified appId.

methods.name: OnLaunch
methods.description: Handles app launch requests for a specified appId.

methods.name: NavigateToCompanyPage
methods.description: Navigates to the company page for a specified appId.

methods.name: PromptEmail
methods.description: Prompts email input for a specified appId.

methods.name: ShowPinOverlay
methods.description: Displays a PIN overlay for a specified appId.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Handles settings commands for a specified appId and payload.

methods.name: SubscribeToSettings
methods.description: Subscribes to settings changes for a specified appId.

methods.name: EntitlementsAccountLink
methods.description: Handles entitlements account linking for a specified appId and payload.

methods.name: MediaEventAccountLink
methods.description: Handles media event account linking for a specified appId and payload.

methods.name: LaunchpadAccountLink
methods.description: Handles Launchpad account linking for a specified appId and payload.

methods.name: CompareAppSettings
methods.description: Compares app settings for a specified appId.

methods.name: XIFA
methods.description: Retrieves advertising ID information for a specified appId.

methods.name: AppStoreId
methods.description: Retrieves app store ID for a specified appId.

methods.name: LimitAdTracking
methods.description: Checks if ad tracking is limited for a specified appId.

methods.name: DeviceAdAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves device advertising attributes for a specified appId.

methods.name: InitObject
methods.description: Initializes an object with options for a specified appId.

methods.name: AppAuth
methods.description: Handles app authentication for a specified appId.

methods.name: OAuthBearerToken
methods.description: Retrieves OAuth bearer token for a specified appId.

methods.name: XSCD
methods.description: Retrieves X-Experience-Cloud ID for a specified appId.

methods.name: RefreshPlatformAuthToken
methods.description: Refreshes the platform authentication token for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetOat
methods.description: Retrieves OAT data for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetXact
methods.description: Retrieves XACT data for a specified appId.

methods.name: Deeplink
methods.description: Handles deeplink requests for a specified appId.

methods.name: NavigateToEntityPage
methods.description: Navigates to an entity page for a specified appId.

methods.name: NavigateToFullScreenVideo
methods.description: Navigates to fullscreen video for a specified appId.

methods.name: ResizeVideo
methods.description: Resizes video for a specified appId.

methods.name: LogMoneyBadgerLoaded
methods.description: Logs loading of MoneyBadger for a specified appId.

methods.name: GetSystemInfo
methods.description: Retrieves system info for a specified appId.

methods.name: MetricsHandler
methods.description: Handles metrics for a specified appId.

methods.name: Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down app interactions for a specified appId.

methods.name: DismissLoadingScreen
methods.description: Dismisses loading screen for a specified appId.
